Cat.Name: Titlescreen

Cat.Name: Main
Cat.Desc: The Main-menu texts

Str.Name: pressStart
Str.Desc: "Press start to begin" (the gamepad button)

Str.Name: pressEnter
Str.Desc: "Press enter to begin" (the keyboard key)

Str.Name: clickAnywhere
Str.Desc: "Click anywhere to begin" (with the mouse)

Str.Name: newGame
Str.Desc: The text on a savefile button when the savefile is empty

Str.Name: timeFormat
Str.Desc: The time format of the region Has to be either "AmPm" or "24H"

Str.Name: chapterLabel
Str.Desc: The 'Chapter'

Str.Name: startLabel
Str.Desc: The 'Start game' label for the start-game-button

Str.Name: deleteConfirmation
Str.Desc: When deleting a savefile, this text pops up and asks for confirmation

Str.Name: storyHeader
Str.Desc: The header label of the story box; 'The story so far'

Cat.Name: Title Screen Story Summaries
Cat.Desc: Every time the game progresses storywise, the Story summaries on the title screen update, which are all stored here

Cat.Name: Chapter 1
Cat.Desc: Story Summaries of Chapter 1

Str.Name: storySum1_1
Str.Desc:
"While he was away exploring and solving problems elsewhere, Sonic received a message from Tails: Knuckles is missing!
Tails asked for Sonic's help to track down the Marauders, the mysterious villains who took Knuckles. Sonic returned from afar to help find Knuckles and bring these Marauders to justice! "

Cat.Name: Save menu
Cat.Desc: Texts for the save menu

Str.Name: empty
Str.Desc: When a game file is empty

Str.Name: saveMessage
Str.Desc: When the user wants to save on a slot which already holds save data; Reminding the user that the existing data will be overwritten

Str.Name: saveConfirmation
Str.Desc: 'Confirm' to save on the selected slot

Str.Name: saveCancel
Str.Desc: 'Cancel'; dont save to the selected file

Str.Name: saveReturnMessage
Str.Desc: Asking if the user wants to return to the title screen

Str.Name: saveReturnConfirmation
Str.Desc: Confirming to return to the title screen

Str.Name: saveReturnCancel
Str.Desc: Deciding to continue to play the game

Cat.Name: Profiler menu
Cat.Desc: Texts for the profiler menu

Str.Name: classLabel
Str.Desc: The 'Class' label in the profile menu (the character fighter class)

Str.Name: class1
Str.Desc: 'Power' class (used for dealing damage in a fast paste)

Str.Name: class2
Str.Desc: 'Shifter' class (A mix between Power and Support?)

Str.Name: class3
Str.Desc: 'Support' class (Focused around helping out the team)

Str.Name: class4
Str.Desc: 'Support' class (can take and deal much damage, but is restricted in speed and amount of moves)

Str.Name: equipmentHeader1
Str.Desc: 'Equipment' label

Str.Name: equipmentHeader2
Str.Desc: 'Movement abilities' label

Str.Name: equipmentHeader3
Str.Desc: 'Pow moves' label

Str.Name: nextLvl
Str.Desc: 'Next lvl' label, displays how many exp remain till the character reaches the next level

Str.Name: levelLabel
Str.Desc: 'Level' label, displays the current level of the character

Str.Name: movecount
Str.Desc: 'MoveCount' label, displays the amount of moves of the character ingame

Str.Name: slotEmpty
Str.Desc: Displays whether a characters equipment slot does not hold any gear

Str.Name: noEquipSelected
Str.Desc: Used in the equipment info box; Tells the user that no equipment is selected (and thus there is nothing to show in the info box)

Cat.Desc: Texts for the inventory menu

Str.Name: invMenu1
Str.Desc: When the 'Equipment' inventory is active

Str.Name: invMenu2
Str.Desc: When the 'Consumables' inventory is active

Str.Name: invMenu3
Str.Desc: When the 'Chao' inventory is active

Str.Name: invMenu4
Str.Desc: When the 'Quest items' inventory is active

Str.Name: invSort1
Str.Desc: Sorting after type

Str.Name: invSort2
Str.Desc: Sorting after name

Str.Name: invSort3
Str.Desc: Sorting after amount

Str.Name: equipItem
Str.Desc: The selected item

Str.Name: unequipItem
Str.Desc: The selected item is equipped and can be unequipped

Str.Name: useItem
Str.Desc: The selected item can be use/consumed

Str.Name: equipChao
Str.Desc: The selecte chao can be equipped

Str.Name: unequipChao
Str.Desc: The selected chao is equipped and can be unequipped

Str.Name: alreadyEquipped
Str.Desc: The character already has an item/chao of this type equipped

Str.Name: notEquippable
Str.Desc: The character cant equip this type of item

Str.Name: noItemThere
Str.Desc: The selected inventory does not hold any items/chao

Str.Name: nothingSelected
Str.Desc: No item/chao is selected

Cat.Desc: Texts used in the journal menu

Str.Name: JHeader1
Str.Desc: 'Codex' directory header (lore, character info)

Str.Name: JHeader2
Str.Desc: 'Missions' directory header

Str.Name: JHeader3
Str.Desc: 'Guides' directory header

Str.Name: JHeader4
Str.Desc: 'Videos' directory header

Str.Name: JHeader5
Str.Desc: 'Credits' directory header

Cat.Name: Overworld map menu
Cat.Desc: Texts used in the overworld map menu

Cat.Name: Zone descriptions
Cat.Desc: Descriptions for each zone ingame

Str.Name: areaDesc1
Str.Desc: Green Hill Zone description: A tropical paradise that's home to some of the most exotic local wildlife, and with its abstract topography and luscious green grass, it's a popular destination for many travellers.

Str.Name: areaDesc2
Str.Desc: Central City description: An influential hub of commerce and industry, this diverse city is home to everything from a simple curio store to the militaristic G.U.N. Headquarters.

Str.Name: areaDesc3
Str.Desc: Mystic Ruins description: This dense jungle was once home to an ancient civilization, which mysteriously disappeared thousands of years ago. Today, all that remains are their ruins, which surround the place with mystery.

Str.Name: areaDesc4
Str.Desc: Blue Ridge Zone description: A chilly alpine region abundant with snowfall and azure greenery, the survivors of Perfect Chaos eke out a modest lifestyle after Station Square’s destruction.

Str.Name: areaDesc5
Str.Desc: Metropolis description: A dystopian wasteland Built by Dr. Ivo 'Eggman' Robotnik, which has fallen to ruin after his defeat several years ago. Now its filled with ghost factories and taskless robots walking around the site.

Str.Name: areaDesc6
Str.Desc: Angel Island description: As the seat of the Master Emerald, this floating island is one of the last relics of an ancient civilization.The Island itself has crashed into the ocean several times in recent years.

Str.Name: areaDesc7
Str.Desc: Metropolis Ground Zero description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc8
Str.Desc: Kron Colony description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc9
Str.Desc: N'rrgal colony description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc10
Str.Desc: Zoah Colony description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc11
Str.Desc: Voxai Colony Beta description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc12
Str.Desc: Voxai Colony Alpha description: TBD

Str.Name: areaDesc13
Str.Desc: Nocturne description: TBD

Cat.Name: Item descriptions
Cat.Desc: Descriptions for each item

Str.Name: itemD1
Str.Desc: Alloy Boots: "Modern footwear made from very durable material. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD2
Str.Desc: Alloy Slippers: "Modern footwear made from very durable material. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD3
Str.Desc: Angel Amulet: "A mystical amulet with the inexhaustible poweer to put the fallen back on their feet."

Str.Name: itemD4
Str.Desc: Blunt Claws: "Standard grade work claws. Slightly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD5
Str.Desc: Boxing Gloves: "Super tough gloves provide the maximum fighting edge. Slightly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD6
Str.Desc: Chao Print Dress: "A stylish dress sure to make one look extra striking. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD7
Str.Desc: Cloth Gloves: "Casual, stylish and comfortable."

Str.Name: itemD8
Str.Desc: Cursed Claws: "Prototype combat claws. Dif? cult to control, but very powerful. Immensely increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD9
Str.Desc: Cursed Gloves: "A prototype combat glove. Tough to control, but very powerful. Immensely increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD10
Str.Desc: Dura-Hydraulics: "Double reinforced parts for maximum durability. Greatly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD11
Str.Desc: Earth Ring: "A ring infused with earthquake force. Gives Earth damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD12
Str.Desc: Economizer: "A wrist device able to boost its wearer's energy levels. Lowers PP cost of all POW Moves by 1."

Str.Name: itemD13
Str.Desc: Fire Ring: "A ring infused with the power of inferno. Gives Fire damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD14
Str.Desc: Golden Gloves: "A master crafted combat glove without peer, a rare artifact. Slightly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD15
Str.Desc: Grapple Claws: "Standard grade, durable and reliable combat claws. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD16
Str.Desc: Gritty Gloves: "All-around tough gloves for tough customers. Moderately increases armor, moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD17
Str.Desc: Ice Ring: "A ring infused with the power of subzero cold. Gives Ice damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD18
Str.Desc: Immunity Talisman: "A mystical charm with the inexhaustible ability to make one immune to afflictions."

Str.Name: itemD19
Str.Desc: Iron Claws: "Extra durable work claws combine protection with power. Moderately increase damage, slightyl increase armor."

Str.Name: itemD20
Str.Desc: Iron Hydraulics: "Hardened metal for durability and greater hitting power. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD21
Str.Desc: Kron Hammer: "A rock hammer infused with ultimate combat power. Very greatly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD22
Str.Desc: Light Boots: "Fashionable and comfortable boots. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD23
Str.Desc: Light Slippers: "Casual, stylish and comfortable. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD24
Str.Desc: Light Sneakers: "Simple, reliable sneakers. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD25
Str.Desc: Lightning Ring: "A ring infused with the power of raw lightning. Gives Lightning damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD26
Str.Desc: Lucky Gloves: "Durable yet agile gloves soaked in clover juice."

Str.Name: itemD27
Str.Desc: Master Hydraulics: "Premium grade materials providing the best defense and armor. Greatly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD28
Str.Desc: Mirror Gloves: "Made with ?exible metal, these shiny gloves boost combat powers. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD29
Str.Desc: Nimble Slippers: "Light, agile slippers for quick feet. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD30
Str.Desc: Nocturne Blade: "A blade infused with ultimate martial skill."

Str.Name: itemD31
Str.Desc: N'rrgal Module: "This device has the uncanny ability to help one when trying to escape or catch someone."

Str.Name: itemD32
Str.Desc: Oily Hydraulics: "Well lubricated and lightweight parts for more agility. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD33
Str.Desc: Polymer Gloves: "Gloves made with durable polymers. Slightly increases damage and armor."

Str.Name: itemD34
Str.Desc: Power Gloves: "Infused with power, these gloves hit hard but can be tricky to handle. Greatly increases damage but reduces attack."

Str.Name: itemD35
Str.Desc: Pretty Dress: "A lovely dress sure to make one ? ght with extra grace and style."

Str.Name: itemD36
Str.Desc: Refresher: "A medical kit that recovers 1 POW Point at the end of each round of combat."

Str.Name: itemD37
Str.Desc: Replenisher: "A wrist device able to regenerate the wearer's health over time. Regenerates 5% of maximum HP per round."

Str.Name: itemD38
Str.Desc: Rubber Gloves: "Light and smooth gloves for faster reaction. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD39
Str.Desc: Rusty Hydraulics: "Leftover parts from disassembled E-100 series robots. Moderately increases armor but decreases defense."

Str.Name: itemD40
Str.Desc: Serrated Claws: "Aggressive, razor sharp combat claws that require caution to use. Greatly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD41
Str.Desc: Shielded Sneakers: "Prototype footwear offering the best armor available. Greatly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD42
Str.Desc: Sparkly Gloves: "Light and dazzling, these gloves tingle with energy. Greatly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD43
Str.Desc: Speedy Sneakers: "Light and well cushioned for more agility. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD44
Str.Desc: Spiked Gloves: "Cleated gloves that pack a nasty punch. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD45
Str.Desc: Spiked Slippers: "Aggressively styled footwear. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD46
Str.Desc: Spiked Sneakers: "Sneakers with cleats provide an edge in combat. Slightly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD47
Str.Desc: Spiny Claws: "Needle-like claws that tear through steel. Greatly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD48
Str.Desc: Spooky Charm: "A mystical charm likely to cause fear in one's enemies. Foes ? ee more often."

Str.Name: itemD49
Str.Desc: Steel Toe Boots: "Steel reinforced to provide more kick in combat. Greatly increases armor. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD50
Str.Desc: Stiff Sneakers: "Sneakers made wtih tough polymers. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD51
Str.Desc: Swift Boots: "Agile and speedy boots for the quick footed."

Str.Name: itemD52
Str.Desc: Titanium Claws: "Master grade combat claws providing superior overall combat power. Greatly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD53
Str.Desc: Tough Slippers: "Heavy duty slippers for outdoor use. Greatly increases armor but reduces defense."

Str.Name: itemD54
Str.Desc: Voxai Teleporter: "A teleporter infused with ultimate agility."

Str.Name: itemD55
Str.Desc: Water Ring: "A ring infused with the power of tidal fury. Gives Water damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD56
Str.Desc: Wind Ring: "A ring infused with the power of a hurricane. Gives Wind damage to basic attacks."

Str.Name: itemD57
Str.Desc: Work Boots: "Durable and rugged for tough customers. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD58
Str.Desc: Work Gloves: "More durable gloves to pack extra punch. Slightly increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD59
Str.Desc: Zoah Shield: "An energy shield infused with Invulnerability. Greatly increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD60
Str.Desc: Antidote: "A curative elixir that removes all bad status effects from one team member."

Str.Name: itemD61
Str.Desc: Bug Spray: "A potent pesticide for pesky critters of the insect variety. Weakens insects."

Str.Name: itemD62
Str.Desc: Clover Juice: "Made with an extract capable of boosting ones luck for short periods."

Str.Name: itemD63
Str.Desc: Crazy Beans: "Boosts you in unpredictable ways. Try them and see what happens!"

Str.Name: itemD64
Str.Desc: Cure All Spray: "A large dose antidote able to remove status ailments from all team members at once."

Str.Name: itemD65
Str.Desc: Health Leaf: "The leaf of a plant known for its healing effects."

Str.Name: itemD66
Str.Desc: Health Root: "The root of a plant known for its healing effects."

Str.Name: itemD67
Str.Desc: Health Seed: "The seed of a plant known for its healing effects."

Str.Name: itemD68
Str.Desc: Immunity Booster: "A vaccine effective in preventing debilitating systems for short periods."

Str.Name: itemD69
Str.Desc: Iron Tonic: "Made with medicine capable of toughening the skin for short periods. Moderately increases armor."

Str.Name: itemD70
Str.Desc: Med Emitter: "An alien device that produces an energy pulse that heals all party members. Restores HP"

Str.Name: itemD71
Str.Desc: POW Candy: "A refreshing formula that invigorates mind and body."

Str.Name: itemD72
Str.Desc: POW Drink: "A refreshing formula that invigorates mind and body."

Str.Name: itemD73
Str.Desc: POW Gum: "A refreshing formula that invigorates mind and body."

Str.Name: itemD74
Str.Desc: Prune Juice: "Made with an extract guaranteed to improve combat abilities for short periods."

Str.Name: itemD75
Str.Desc: Psychic Water: "A rare concoction capable of providing heightened premonition for short periods."

Str.Name: itemD76
Str.Desc: Refresher Wave: "An alien device that produces an energy pulse that invigorates all party members."

Str.Name: itemD77
Str.Desc: Revival Ring: "A ring with the power to put the fallen back on their feet. Revives one KO'ed team member."

Str.Name: itemD78
Str.Desc: Ring of Life: "A ring with the power to put the fallen back into fighting shape. Revives one KO'ed team member."

Str.Name: itemD79
Str.Desc: Rock Salt: "A rare earth extract capable of raising one's raw strength for short periods. Moderately increases damage."

Str.Name: itemD80
Str.Desc: Speed Bar: "Made with medicine capable of boosting one's re?exes for short periods of time."

Str.Name: itemD81
Str.Desc: Beam Cannon: "A non-lethal weapon created to banish the Marauders without harming them."

Str.Name: itemD82
Str.Desc: Red Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Kron Colony."

Str.Name: itemD83
Str.Desc: Sky Blue Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Zoah Colony."

Str.Name: itemD84
Str.Desc: Green Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the N'rrgal Colony."

Str.Name: itemD85
Str.Desc: 'White' (Pink) Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Voxai Colony Alpha. It's been turned pink by the Voxai."

Str.Name: itemD86
Str.Desc: Yellow Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Voxai Colony Beta."

Str.Name: itemD87
Str.Desc: Purple Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Nocturne."

Str.Name: itemD88
Str.Desc: Blue Chaos Emerald: "One of the legendary Chaos Emeralds, found at the Nocturne."

Str.Name: itemD89
Str.Desc: Communicator: "A device used by the Marauders to keep in touch with their base."

Str.Name: itemD90
Str.Desc: Eggman Detector: "A device that detects Eggman's electronic signature."

Str.Name: itemD91
Str.Desc: Eggman Device: "A device built by Eggman. It doesn't seem to do anything."

Str.Name: itemD92
Str.Desc: GUN Official: " "Please, no time to talk. I must return to Station Square. I'm very important, you know!" "

Str.Name: itemD93
Str.Desc: Little Boy: " "Thanks so much for saving me, Sonic! Please take me home to Central City!" "

Str.Name: itemD94
Str.Desc: Nocturnes Tech: "A piece of Nocturnus Clan technology so advanced that even Tails can't figure out its function."

Str.Name: itemD95
Str.Desc: Pattern Generator: "A device that generates code patterns that interfere with energy fields."

Str.Name: itemD96
Str.Desc: Precursor Tablett: "A stone tablet covered in strange writing."

Str.Name: itemD97
Str.Desc: Prized Stapler: "A stunningly beautiful device, when you really look at it."

Str.Name: itemD98
Str.Desc: Timothy: " "My dad isn't really crazy, just old. He'll be glad to see me, I know." "

Str.Name: itemD99
Str.Desc: Weapon Part: "A part needed for Eggman and Tails to create their ultimate weapon."

Str.Name: itemD100
Str.Desc: N'rrgal Shipment: "A crate filled with N'rrgal Sweat. Ew!"

Str.Name: itemD101
Str.Desc: Kron Payment: "The payment for the N'rrgal Sweat delivery, addressed to the N'rrgal Trader."

Cat.Name: Chao names
Cat.Desc: Names of all Chao

Cat.Name: Chao descriptions
Cat.Desc: Descriptions for the ability of each Chao

Str.Name: chaoD1
Str.Desc: Barbo: "Increases Maximum HP of bonded character."

Str.Name: chaoD2
Str.Desc: Belgog: "Bonded character is much harder to hit."

Str.Name: chaoD3
Str.Desc: Bepke: "At least one enemy will automatically attack the bonded character instead of other team members."

Str.Name: chaoD4
Str.Desc: Blayze: "Bonded character does much more damage in battle."

Str.Name: chaoD5
Str.Desc: Bobo: "Bonded character will always find an extra reward item after combat."

Str.Name: chaoD6
Str.Desc: Cheese: "Greatly increases luck of all team members."

Str.Name: chaoD7
Str.Desc: Cheezlet: "Bonded character does more damage in battle."

Str.Name: chaoD8
Str.Desc: Choo: "Bonded character regenerates PP at the start of each combat round."

Str.Name: chaoD9
Str.Desc: Choopaloo: "Increases XP gained from each battle."

Str.Name: chaoD10
Str.Desc: Churdle: "Bonded character has a better chance of hitting targets in battle."

Str.Name: chaoD11
Str.Desc: Dusty: "Increases the chance that the team will catch a fleeing opponent."

Str.Name: chaoD12
Str.Desc: Ferox: "Bonded character automatically succeeds using their POW moves."

Str.Name: chaoD13
Str.Desc: Fess: "Increases the odds that Chao eggs will hatch rare or unique Chao."

Str.Name: chaoD14
Str.Desc: Ghise: "Bonded character's attacks do Water damage."

Str.Name: chaoD15
Str.Desc: Gibber: "Bonded character has greatly increased resistance to damage."

Str.Name: chaoD16
Str.Desc: Griff: "Bonded character's attacks do Ice damage."

Str.Name: chaoD17
Str.Desc: Hayda: "Regenerates PP at the start of each combat round for all team members."

Str.Name: chaoD18
Str.Desc: Jirna: "Chao creates an earth shield to protect against damage."

Str.Name: chaoD19
Str.Desc: Joy: "Regenerates HP at the start of each combat round for all team members."

Str.Name: chaoD20
Str.Desc: Kayla: "Reduces the team's chance of being ambushed."

Str.Name: chaoD21
Str.Desc: Keroyo: "Increases odds of enemies fleeing from battle."

Str.Name: chaoD22
Str.Desc: Knickt: "Chao creates a shield of lightning to protect against damage."

Str.Name: chaoD23
Str.Desc: Koolet: "Bonded character is harder to hit."

Str.Name: chaoD24
Str.Desc: Korus: "Chao creates a shield of fire to protect against damage."

Str.Name: chaoD25
Str.Desc: Luunan: "Greatly increases the maximum PP of bonded character."

Str.Name: chaoD26
Str.Desc: Oldarg: "Bonded character has a greatly increased chance to hit targets in battle."

Str.Name: chaoD27
Str.Desc: Oolean: "Increases maximum PP of bonded character."

Str.Name: chaoD28
Str.Desc: Ovus: "Bonded character is automatically revived once during a battle."

Str.Name: chaoD29
Str.Desc: Perty: "Chao creates a shield of water to protect against damage."

Str.Name: chaoD30
Str.Desc: Pyraz: "Bonded character's attacks do fire damage."

Str.Name: chaoD31
Str.Desc: Radu: "Greatly increases the maximum HP of bonded character."

Str.Name: chaoD32
Str.Desc: Rugle: "Bonded character has increased luck."

Str.Name: chaoD33
Str.Desc: Seeri: "Chao creates a shield of wind to protect against damage."

Str.Name: chaoD34
Str.Desc: Seggo: "Bonded character's attacks do Wind damage."

Str.Name: chaoD35
Str.Desc: Spartoi: "Bonded character's attacks may cause instant KO against enemies."

Str.Name: chaoD36
Str.Desc: Stebsly: "Bonded character regenerates HP at the start of every combat round."

Str.Name: chaoD37
Str.Desc: Stiglin: "Bonded character's attacks do Earth damage."

Str.Name: chaoD38
Str.Desc: Velk: "Bonded character has increased resistance to damage."

Str.Name: chaoD39
Str.Desc: Zimbar: "Bonded character's attacks do Lightning damage."

Str.Name: chaoD40
Str.Desc: Zousar: "Increases the team's chances of Ambushing opposing teams."

Str.Name: chaoD41
Str.Desc: Kuna: "Increases the amount of rings gathered at the end of a battle."

Cat.Name: Journal Entries
Cat.Desc: Texts for the individual journal entries

Cat.Name: Dialogs
Cat.Desc: Dialog texts

Cat.Name: Story Dialogs
Cat.Desc: Dialogs that are played or change with the progression of the game

Cat.Name: StoryDialogue_1
Cat.Desc: The conversation between Tails and Sonic after Sonic arrives in Green Hill

Str.Name: C1SD1_1
Str.Desc: Tails: "Sonic, you made it! I'm so glad to hear from you!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_2
Str.Desc: Sonic: "I'm here, Tails. What's going on?"

Str.Name: C1SD1_3
Str.Desc: Tails: "We're in big trouble, Sonic. Knuckles has gone missing. And so have the Chaos Emeralds!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_4
Str.Desc: Tails: "A group of criminals called the Marauders kidnapped him! We need your help!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_5
Str.Desc: Sonic: "Of course I'll help!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_6
Str.Desc: Tails: "I knew you would! I just knew it!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_7
Str.Desc: Tails: "I can see you on my Monitors, so even if I'm not with you, I'll guide you if you have any trouble."

Str.Name: C1SD1_8
Str.Desc: Sonic: "What else do you know about the situation?"

Str.Name: C1SD1_9
Str.Desc: Tails: "Knuckles was fighting against the Marauders when he disappeared. We're not really sure who they are, but they're bad news!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_10
Str.Desc: Tails: "Please Sonic. I'll explain more when you get here! We're losing time!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_11
Str.Desc: Sonic: "Wait, they took the Chaos Emeralds too?"

Str.Name: C1SD1_12
Str.Desc: Tails: "They did! And that means trouble!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_13
Str.Desc: Tails: "The Chaos Emeralds are powerful gems, Sonic. Someone who knows how to use them could do just about anything with their power!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_14
Str.Desc: Tails: "You know how you've used all the 7 Chaos Emeralds? By using their power to become Super Sonic, you were pretty much unbeatable!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_15
Str.Desc: Sonic: "Well Yeah! How could i ever forget?"

Str.Name: C1SD1_16
Str.Desc: Tails: "Without knowing who the Marauders are, there's no telling what they'll do with the Chaos Emeralds. We have to stop them!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_17
Str.Desc: Sonic: "Right. Let's go!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_18
Str.Desc: Tails: "Amy is on her way to meet you. Once you find her, meet me at my workshop near Central City."

Str.Name: C1SD1_19
Str.Desc: Sonic: "Sounds like a plan. I'll be there in a flash!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_20
Str.Desc: Tails: "Great! Thanks, Sonic. With you on our side, I know we'll save Knuckles!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_21
Str.Desc: Sonic: "O-Oh! ... A-Amy's tagging along? H-How quaint..."

Str.Name: C1SD1_22
Str.Desc: Tails: "Well, you know how she is. She wanted to meet you halfway and make sure you got here safely."

Str.Name: C1SD1_23
Str.Desc: Tails: "I'll wait for you in the workshop. With you on the team, I know we'll save Knuckles!"

Str.Name: C1SD1_24
Str.Desc: Tails: "Let's go!"

Cat.Name: Subtitles
Cat.Desc: Video Subtitles
